sentences.sContent: He was asked to manage a new department.
sentences.sCn: 他被要求去管理一个新的部门。

sentences.sContent: Managing a football team is harder than you think.
sentences.sCn: 管理一支足球队比你想象的要难。

sentences.sContent: The company had been very badly managed.
a brewery which has been owned and managed by the same family for over 100 years
sentences.sCn: 被同一个家族拥有和经营了一百多年的啤酒厂

phrases.pCn: 挣扎做某事；设法完成某事
没有…而仍设法对付过去

words.tran: 易管理的；易控制的；易办的
管理；管理人员；管理部门；操纵；经营手段

trans.tranOther: to direct or control a business or department and the people, equipment, and money involved in it
